amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $600,000 appropriated to carry out the African Elephant Conservation Act, and $200,000 appropriated for the rhinoceros and tiger conservation fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 30 in the Congressional Record of July 12 to delete the $800,000 in funding for the African elephant, Rhinoceros, and Tiger Funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neumann amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 289 (Roll no. 503).
